content: on a holder or bind off with scrap yarn cast on 15 sts top two wrist cables cross then 5 rounds provisionally see appendix then rejoin and complete bottom wrist cable cross then 4 rounds bind off the round k3 p1 k4 p1 3 times k1 p1 54 sts 4 road trip knits » over the next inch or so rounds will continue in pattern you should have 19 stitches ready to work the thumb as set knit the knits purl the purls start the round on the first stitch picked up from the provisional cast on leave a tail of about 6-8 inches round 2 k4 p1 3 times k21 p1 k4 p1 3 times k1 p1 you ll need this for grafting later repeat this round until mitt reaches about halfway down the fleshy part at the base of the thumb then as you work there will be sizeable holes on either side work one more round while placing a marker for of the thumb this is ok ignore them for now working the upcoming gusset shaping last round k4 p1 3 times k18 place marker k3 p1 round 1 k15 p1 k1 twice k4 p1 3 times k1 p1 repeat this round until length is slightly less than desired finished thumb length last round ssk k10 k2tog k1 p1 k1 twice gusset decreases round 1 k4 p1 3 times k3 ssk k to 2 sts before marker bind off thumb k2tog k3 p1 k4 p1 3 times k1 p1 52 sts round 2 work in pattern as set finishing repeat these two rounds 4 more times 3 knit sts now use the tail at the base of the thumb to graft the holes remain between decreases 44 sts closed as shown in the appendix tutorials last round repeat round 2 once more » ending with 2 non-shaping rounds creates a smoother weave in all ends wash and lay flat to dry transition between the base of the thumb and the upcoming wrist cables mate remove marker work the mate exactly as the first mitt wrist round 1 cable cross round next 5 rounds body rib round repeat these 6 rounds once then repeat round 1 » next you will re-introduce the hidden purl stitch inside each cable italics added for emphasis last 4 rounds k2 p1 k1 p1 4 times k1 p1 k1 p1 k2 p1 4 times k1 p1 bind off wrist thumb setup for working the thumb 1 mark the corner stitches with stitch markers as shown in the appendix you ll return to these later 2 unpick the scrap yarn and place the 14 central provisional stitches onto the working needle as you go make sure they are all live sts 3 move the 5 sts on the stitch holder onto the working needles photo credit cheryl niamath sincere
